findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The code does not follow the Solidity style guide for naming conventions, making it less readable and maintainable.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: The contract is missing events that are essential for logging and notifying external parties about changes or actions within the contract.

findings.title: L14 - Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: Using uninitialized local variables can lead to unpredictable behavior and potential errors in the contract.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: The contract performs operations on variables that have been configured based on user-supplied input without proper validation, which can lead to problems when the contract is executed.

findings.title: L20 - Succeeded Transfer Check
findings.description: The transfer methods should check if the result is successful according to the ERC20 specification, otherwise, the contract may wrongly assume that the transfer has been established.
